definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Every Saturday since then, I have taken one marble out and thrown it away.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，每到星期六，我都拿出一個彈珠扔掉。

sentences.english: I need to buy some marbles.
sentences.chinese: 我需要買一些玻璃彈珠。

sentences.english: Is the marble ball platform that MacDonald gives, which is annual?
sentences.chinese: 麥當勞送的彈珠檯，是哪年的？

sentences.english: Bubble Bobble, a very popular pinball game.
sentences.chinese: 泡泡龍，一個十分流行的彈珠遊戲。

sentences.english: The effect is strengthened by the sound of hundreds of marbles rolling in every direction.
sentences.chinese: 幾百個滾向各個方向的彈珠發出的聲音加強了效果。

sentences.english: There are two boys playing marbles, while a boy nearby rolls a hoop.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個男孩玩彈珠，而一名男童附近的軋輥一夏。

sentences.english: Put marbles in the hubcaps of someone’s car.
sentences.chinese: 在別人車轂蓋裏放幾個彈珠。

sentences.english: And that's when he began to explain his theory of "a thousand marbles."
sentences.chinese: 這時，他開始詳細說明他那“一千顆彈珠”的理論。

sentences.english: Marble, also known as hoodle, a kind of toy, made by glass.
sentences.chinese: 彈球，專業叫彈珠，玩具的一種，由玻璃製成。

sentences.english: Peter was good at playing marbles when young.
sentences.chinese: 彼得年輕時很會打彈珠。

sentences.english: I ended up having to visit three toy stores to round-up 1, 000 marbles.
sentences.chinese: 結果，我去了三家店才湊齊了1000個彈珠。

sentences.english: Put marbles in the hubcaps of someone's car.
sentences.chinese: 在別人車轂蓋裏放幾個彈珠。

sentences.english: The boy clutched the marbles and ran away.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩一把搶去彈珠便逃之夭夭。

definition: ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
lit. to draw a gourd from the model (idiom)/fig. to copy sth mechanically without attempt at originality
